Hello! My name is Qinyan(Christy) Feng. I'm currently a 4th year undergraduate student at the University of California, Los Angeles. I'm doing a double major in Molecular, Cell, and Developmental Biology & Statistics and Data Science. My research interests lie in cancer immunology, immunometabolism, innate immunity, and bioinformatics. Welcome to my personal website!
